sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './ClassRoutine.css'; const TeacherPopup = ({ teacher, onClose }) => { if (!teacher) return null; return (

{teacher.name}

Department: {teacher.department}

); }; const ClassRoutine = () => { const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false); const [selectedTeacher, setSelectedTeacher] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { setVisible(true); }, []); const teachers = { 'Mr. Hasan': { name: 'Mr. Hasan', department: 'Mathematics', image: '../assets/teachers/mrhasan.jpg' }, 'Ms. Hena': { name: 'Ms. Hena', department: 'Bengali', image: '../assets/teachers/mshena.jpg' }, 'Mr. Ratul': { name: 'Mr. Ratul', department: 'English', image: '../assets/teachers/mrratul.jpg' }, 'Mr. Salam': { name: 'Mr. Salam', department: 'Science', image: '../assets/teachers/mrsalam.jpg' }, 'Mr. Farid': { name: 'Mr. Farid', department: 'S.T.E.M', image: '../assets/teachers/mrfarid.jpg' }, 'Ms. Falguni': { name: 'Ms. Falguni', department: 'L&L', image: '../assets/teachers/msfalguni.jpg' }, 'Ms. Sania': { name: 'Ms. Sania', department: 'Wellbeing', image: '../assets/teachers/mssania.jpg' }, 'Mr. Emamul': { name: 'Mr. Emamul', department: 'English', image: '../assets/teachers/mremamul.jpg' }, 'Ms. Borna': { name: 'Ms. Borna', department: 'H.S.S', image: '../assets/teachers/msborna.jpg' }, 'Ms. Sajia': { name: 'Ms. Sajia', department: 'Art & Culture', image: '../assets/teachers/mssajia.jpg' }, 'Ms. Suraiya': { name: 'Ms. Suraiya', department: 'Religion', image: '../assets/teachers/misssuraiya.jpg' }, 'Mr. Debnath': { name: 'Mr. Debnath', department: 'Religion', image: '../assets/teachers/mrhasan.jpg' }, }; const handleTeacherClick = (teacherName) => { setSelectedTeacher(teachers[teacherName]); }; const closePopup = () => { setSelectedTeacher(null); }; const renderTeacherName = (name) => ( handleTeacherClick(name)} style={{cursor: 'pointer'}}> {name} ); return (

Class 9 Routine

Day P1 P2 P3 R P4 P5 P6 P7 P8
Sun Bengali
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Hena')}		 English
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Ratul')}		 D.T
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Salam')}		 Recess S.T.E.M
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Farid')}		 L&L
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Falguni')}		 Wellbeing
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Sania')}		 Eng-II
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Emamul')}		 Science
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Salam')}
Mon Bengali
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Hena')}		 Wellbeing
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Sania')}		 H.S.S
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Borna')}		 Recess S.T.E.M
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Farid')}		 Maths
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Hasan')}		 L&L
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Falguni')}		 Eng-II
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Emamul')}		 Science
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Salam')}
Tue Bengali
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Hena')}		 English
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Ratul')}		 H.S.S
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Borna')}		 Recess S.T.E.M
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Farid')}		 Maths
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Hasan')}		 Art & Culture
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Sajia')}		 Eng-II
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Emamul')}		 Science
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Salam')}
Wed Bengali
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Hena')}		 English
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Ratul')}		 H.S.S
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Borna')}		 Recess S.T.E.M
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Farid')}		 Maths
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Hasan')}		 Religion
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Suraiya')}
or {renderTeacherName('Mr. Debnath')}		 Eng-II
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Emamul')}		 Science
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Salam')}
Thu Bengali
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Hena')}		 English
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Ratul')}		 H.S.S
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Borna')}		 Recess Art & Culture
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Sajia')}		 Maths
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Hasan')}		 Religion
{renderTeacherName('Ms. Suraiya')}
or {renderTeacherName('Mr. Debnath')}		 Eng-II
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Emamul')}
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Ratul')}		 BEL
{renderTeacherName('Mr. Emamul')}
or {renderTeacherName('Ms. Hena')}
); }; export default ClassRoutine;
